ingredientsDesc:
4.1.4 Standard diluent (Reagent D; 1 vial)
10.0 ml PP-free human serum. 
4.1.5 PP-standard (Reagent E; 1 vial)
5.0 ml 2000 pmol/l (= 8370 pg/ml) synthetic
human PP-standard. 
4.1.6 Assay buffer (Reagent F; 1 vial)
5.0 ml 0.05 M phosphate buffer, pH 7.4, 0.25 %
human serum albumin and 0.05 % sodium
azide.

4.1.1 Anti-PP (Reagent A; 1 bottle)
Rabbit antiserum raised against bovine PP.
4.1.2 125I-PP (Reagent B; 1 bottle)
Contains 28 KBq or 0.75 µCi of 125I-hPP at the
activity reference date. 
4.1.3 Double antibody-PEG (Reagent C; 1 bottle)
50 ml diluted goat anti-rabbit-Ig antiserum.

4.1.7 Control (Reagents G, H; 2 vials)
Lyophilzed serum controls with low (G) and high
(H) concentration of PP; 1.0 ml of each control
after reconstitution.
applicantName: 常盈實業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市北投區永興路一段49號
efficacy: 利用放射性免疫分析法定量檢測血清中胰多？。
